languages.text: {n}В глазах мученика что-то мелькает, словно ваши слова позволили ему собраться с остатками сил. Скрипнув зубами, он едва заметно приподнимает голову и вперивается в вас безумным взглядом.{/n} "Да укрепит мою волю святая бинарность... да отрину я нестройность вариации..."

traits.locale_text: {n}В глазах мученика что-то мелькает, словно ваши слова позволили ему собраться с остатками сил. Скрипнув зубами, он едва заметно приподнимает голову и вперивается в вас безумным взглядом.{/n} "Да укрепит мою волю святая бинарность... да отрину я нестройность вариации..."

languages.text: {n}Something flashes in the man's eyes, as if your words have allowed him to gather what remains of his strength. Gritting his teeth, he barely raises his head and fastens his mad gaze on you.{/n} "May the Omnissiah strengthen my will... may I renounce the dissonance of variation..."
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах мученика что-то мелькает, словно ваши слова позволили ему собраться с остатками сил. Скрипнув зубами, он едва заметно приподнимает голову и вперивается в вас безумным взглядом.{/n} "Да укрепит мою волю святая бинарность... да отрину я нестройность вариации..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Something flashes in the man's eyes, as if your words have allowed him to gather what remains of his strength. Gritting his teeth, he barely raises his head and fastens his mad gaze on you.{/n} "May the holy binary strengthen my will... may I renounce the dissonance of variation..."

{n}Something flashes in the man's eyes, as if your words have allowed him to gather what remains of his strength. Gritting his teeth, he barely raises his head and fastens his mad gaze on you.{/n} "May the holy binary strengthen my will... may I renounce the dissonance of variation..."

{n}Something flashes in the man's eyes, as if your words have allowed him to gather what remains of his strength. Gritting his teeth, he raises his head an infinitesimal amount and fastens his mad gaze on you.{/n} "May the holy binary strengthen my will... may I renounce the dissonance of variation..."

{n}Something flashes in the man's eyes, as if your words have allowed him to gather what remains of his strength. Gritting his teeth, he barely raises his head and fastens his mad gaze on you.{/n} "May the Omnissiah strengthen my will... may I renounce the dissonance of variation..."

languages.text: {n}这个人的眼中闪过了某些东西，仿佛你的话语让他鼓起了仅存的力量。他咬紧牙关，勉强抬起了头，将炽热的目光投向了你。{/n}“愿欧姆尼塞亚强化我的意志……愿我彻底摒弃不和谐的变化……”
languages.original_text: {n}Something flashes in the man's eyes, as if your words have allowed him to gather what remains of his strength. Gritting his teeth, he barely raises his head and fastens his mad gaze on you.{/n} "May the Omnissiah strengthen my will... may I renounce the dissonance of variation..."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个人的眼中闪过了某些东西，仿佛你的话语让他鼓起了仅存的力量。他咬紧牙关，勉强抬起了头，将炽热的目光投向了你。{/n}“愿欧姆尼塞亚强化我的意志……愿我彻底摒弃不和谐的变化……”

languages.text: {n}Algo se ilumina en los ojos del hombre, como si tus palabras le hubieran permitido reunir las pocas fuerzas que le quedan. Aprieta los dientes y alza débilmente la cabeza, fijando su mirada enloquecida sobre ti.{/n} «Que el Omnissiah refuerce mi voluntad... Renunciaré a la disonancia de la variación...».
languages.original_text: {n}Something flashes in the man's eyes, as if your words have allowed him to gather what remains of his strength. Gritting his teeth, he barely raises his head and fastens his mad gaze on you.{/n} "May the Omnissiah strengthen my will... may I renounce the dissonance of variation..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo se ilumina en los ojos del hombre, como si tus palabras le hubieran permitido reunir las pocas fuerzas que le quedan. Aprieta los dientes y alza débilmente la cabeza, fijando su mirada enloquecida sobre ti.{/n} «Que el Omnissiah refuerce mi voluntad... Renunciaré a la disonancia de la variación...».

languages.text: {n}まるであなたの言葉が男の残った力をかき集めさせたかのように、男の目が輝く。男は歯を食いしばりなんとか頭を上げると、こちらを興奮して見つめる。{/n}「万機神よ、我が意志に、力を…変化の不協和音を…拒絶させて…」
languages.original_text: {n}Something flashes in the man's eyes, as if your words have allowed him to gather what remains of his strength. Gritting his teeth, he barely raises his head and fastens his mad gaze on you.{/n} "May the Omnissiah strengthen my will... may I renounce the dissonance of variation..."

traits.locale_text: {n}まるであなたの言葉が男の残った力をかき集めさせたかのように、男の目が輝く。男は歯を食いしばりなんとか頭を上げると、こちらを興奮して見つめる。{/n}「万機神よ、我が意志に、力を…変化の不協和音を…拒絶させて…」

languages.text: {n}Etwas blitzt in den Augen des Mannes auf, als hätten deine Worte es ihm ermöglicht, seine letzten Kräfte noch einmal zu mobilisieren. Er beißt die Zähne zusammen, hebt minimal den Kopf und fixiert dich mit irrem Blick.{/n} "Möge der Omnissiah meinen Willen stärken ... möge ich der Dissonanz der Variation abschwören ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Something flashes in the man's eyes, as if your words have allowed him to gather what remains of his strength. Gritting his teeth, he barely raises his head and fastens his mad gaze on you.{/n} "May the Omnissiah strengthen my will... may I renounce the dissonance of variation..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Etwas blitzt in den Augen des Mannes auf, als hätten deine Worte es ihm ermöglicht, seine letzten Kräfte noch einmal zu mobilisieren. Er beißt die Zähne zusammen, hebt minimal den Kopf und fixiert dich mit irrem Blick.{/n} "Möge der Omnissiah meinen Willen stärken ... möge ich der Dissonanz der Variation abschwören ..."

languages.text: {n}Un éclair passe dans le regard de l'homme, comme si vos paroles lui avaient permis de rassembler ses dernières forces. Serrant les dents, il relève à peine la tête et braque ses yeux fous sur vous.{/n} « Puisse l'Omnimessie me conférer la volonté... de renoncer à la dissonance des différences... »
languages.original_text: {n}Something flashes in the man's eyes, as if your words have allowed him to gather what remains of his strength. Gritting his teeth, he barely raises his head and fastens his mad gaze on you.{/n} "May the Omnissiah strengthen my will... may I renounce the dissonance of variation..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un éclair passe dans le regard de l'homme, comme si vos paroles lui avaient permis de rassembler ses dernières forces. Serrant les dents, il relève à peine la tête et braque ses yeux fous sur vous.{/n} « Puisse l'Omnimessie me conférer la volonté... de renoncer à la dissonance des différences... »

languages.text: {n}Sanki sözlerin adamın gücünü toplamasını sağlamış gibi gözlerine bir parıltı hâkim oluyor. Dişlerini sıkıp başını zar zor kaldırıyor ve çılgın bakışlarını sana dikiyor.{/n} "Hermesih takdirini eksik etmesin... Beni inhirafın hilafından korusun..."
languages.original_text: {n}Something flashes in the man's eyes, as if your words have allowed him to gather what remains of his strength. Gritting his teeth, he barely raises his head and fastens his mad gaze on you.{/n} "May the Omnissiah strengthen my will... may I renounce the dissonance of variation..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adamın gözlerine, sanki sözlerin son gücünü de toplamasını sağlamış gibi bir parıltı hâkim oluyor. Dişlerini sıkıp başını zar zor kaldırıyor ve çılgın bakışlarını sana dikiyor.{/n} "Hermesih takdirini eksik etmesin... Beni tasrifin tenafüründen korusun..."
